undefined function gethomenavigation



  • 2005-06-15 16:07:43

    undefined function gethomenavigation

    I have finally gotten ATutor 1.5 to look like it wants to work but am now having a problem viewing courses. I get the error message "Fatal error: Call to undefined function get_home_navigation() in /afs/ncsa.uiuc.edu/web/hpc_software/htdocs/ATutor/index.php on line 75" whenever I try to view a course. This must mean that the file containing the function isn't getting included but I have no idea why. Your help would be appreciated. I really want to give ATutor a chance at replacing our WebCT...

    operating system - Linux
    version of ATutor - 1.5
    versions of php - 5.0.3
    version of mysq l - 4.1.11
    webserver & version - Apache ?
    copies of error messages - Fatal error: Call to undefined function get_home_navigation() in /afs/ncsa.uiuc.edu/web/hpc_software/htdocs/ATutor/index.php on line 75
    changes to default settings - None
    web browser being used - Netscape 7.2, IE


    Thanks,

    Sandie
